page.title: 15Politics. Hoo area.
page.content: The area is completely rural with no urban centres and little or no industry which is not based on agriculture. This environment does not lend itself to racialism on the part of the trade unions or the socially orientated political parties, and it is wholly in keeping that the political outlook is strongly Conservative, and is likely to remain so for the forseeable future. The area is situated in the Suffolk Coastal constituency, the local authority being the Suffolk Coastal District Council.
